queries.sql: SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}' AND tags ->> 'place' IN ('country', 'state', 'region', 'province', 'district', 'county', 'municipality', 'city', 'town')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_nodes WHERE tags != '{}'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'aerialway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'aerialway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'power' IN ('cable', 'line')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'power' IN ('cable', 'line', 'minor_line')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'power' IN ('cable', 'line', 'minor_line', 'plant', 'substation')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'amenity'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'boundary' IN ('administrative') AND tags ->> 'admin_level' IN ('1', '2')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'boundary' IN ('administrative') AND tags ->> 'admin_level' IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'boundary'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'building'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'building'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'highway' IN ( 'motorway', 'motorway_link',  'trunk',  'primary', 'secondary')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'highway' IN ( 'motorway', 'motorway_link', 'trunk', 'trunk_link',  'primary', 'secondary', 'tertiary')

SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'highway' IN ( 'motorway', 'motorway_link',  'trunk', 'trunk_link',  'primary', 'primary_link',  'secondary', 'secondary_link',  'tertiary', 'tertiary_link', 'unclassified', 'residential')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'highway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'highway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'natural' IN ('wood', 'scrub', 'heath', 'grassland', 'bare_rock', 'scree', 'shingle', 'sand', 'mud', 'water', 'wetland', 'glacier', 'beach')

SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'natural' IN ('wood', 'scrub', 'heath', 'grassland', 'bare_rock', 'scree', 'shingle', 'sand', 'mud', 'water', 'wetland', 'glacier', 'beach')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'natural'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'natural'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways WHERE tags ? 'leisure'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'leisure'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest', 'meadow', 'residential')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'landuse' IN ('farmland', 'forest', 'meadow', 'residential')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'landuse'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'landuse'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'railway' IN ('rail') AND NOT tags ? 'service'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'railway' AND NOT tags ? 'service'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'railway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'route'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'route'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'man_made'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('river')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('river', 'stream')
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_ways_z$zoom WHERE tags ? 'waterway'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE tags ->> 'water' = 'lake'
SELECT id, tags, geom FROM osm_relations_z$zoom WHERE (tags ->> 'natural' = 'water' OR tags ->> 'waterway' IN ('riverbank', 'dock'))
